caption.p: Schematic of the SARS-CoV-2 genome organization and virion. This CoV genome comprises a 5′-untranslated region (5′-UTR), open-reading frames (ORFs) 1a and 1b encoding nonstructural proteins 3-chymotrypsin-like protease (3CLpro), papain-like protease (PLpro), helicase (Hel), and RNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RdRp) as well as accessory proteins, and the structural S protein (S), E protein (E), M protein (M), and N phosphoprotein (N)
